author: Thomas Bardwell
title: GameStop’s COVID-19 Plastic Bag Insanity is Reckless Employee Endangerment
description: GameStop has instructed employees to use a plastic bag to protect against COVID-19 during curbside service interactions with customers. The post GameStop’s COVID-19 Plastic Bag Insanity is Reckless Employee Endangerment appeared first on CCN.com
content:
• GameStop continues to flaunt essential service rules, peddling products through a curbside Delivery@Door service.
